summary: Create an ad-watching platform (web/app) where users watch ads and earn payouts via UPI, potentially distributed through Google Play Store.

existing_features.title: Update the frontend user flow to collect and use a user's UPI ID for cash payouts: allow entering/editing UPI ID in the profile setup or user settings area, require it when submitting a cash redemption, and show it in the admin payout management list for pending requests.

Clarify user-facing copy that cash payouts are processed via UPI based on the stored UPI ID and are admin-approved (manual), without claiming automated UPI transfers or Google Play Store distribution.

new_feature_requests.summary: Build an ad-watching platform where users view ads and earn money, with payout support via UPI and/or distribution through Google Play Store

Extend backend data models and APIs to support UPI payout details for cash redemptions: add an optional UPI ID field to the caller's user profile, allow users to set/update it, and store the UPI ID on each cash RewardRequest at the time of redemption so admins can see where to pay.

projectName: Add UPI payout details for cash rewards in the ad-watching app
